scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:canopy: npm run build && rm -rf ../spalpatine/jspm_packages/npm/single-spa@2.0.6 && rsync -av . ../spalpatine/jspm_packages/npm/single-spa@2.0.6 --exclude node_modules --exclude .git --exclude --spec --exclude examples && cd ../spalpatine && npm run build-common-deps && cd ../single-spa
